262.title: ECMAScript 2015 Language Specification
262.description: This Standard defines the ECMAScript 2015 general purpose programming language.

39.title: ECMAScript
39.scope: Standardization of the general purpose, cross platform, vendor-neutral programming language ECMAScript. This includes the language syntax, semantics, and libraries and complementary technologies that support the language.
programme_of_work: To maintain and update the standard for the ECMAScript programming language.
To identify, develop and maintain standards for libraries that extend the capabilities of ECMAScript.
To develop test suites that may be used to verify correct implementation of these standards.
To contribute selected standards to ISO/IEC JTC 1.
To evaluate and consider proposals for complementary or additional technologies.
